name: Please Date Me, Diana!
description:
DESCRIPTION: 

Akko was gonna do it, she’s not scared anymore!! She and Diana had been growing closer these past few years and she was finally ready to take the leap and confess her undying love!! She’s even got it written down on paper!!

…Or maybe she’ll just throw it away for the 893rd time.

A fangame/love letter to the fandom that means so much to me and the couple that we love to watch fall in love with each other over and over again. 

Can be played as a standalone! But if you enjoy it, go watch Little Witch Academia!!

FEATURES:

(CAUTION!!: THIS IS A DEMO!! ALL FEATURES IN THE GAME MIGHT NOT BE IMPLEMENTED YET!!)

20+ achievements 

3 endings + 1 secret one 

Lotte dunking on Amanda 

Diana being a lesbian mess (and almost having an aneurysm)

A story about growing old and taking on the world (and that when you do, you won’t be alone)

Atsuko “Akko” Kagari - current mood: gay, loves: making her friends happy, Diana

Diana Cavendish - current mood: homosexuality, loves: not dying preferably, ???

Amanda O’Neill - current mood: two girls kissing, loves: your mom, ???

Lotte Yanson - current mood: angel, loves: romance novels

Sucy Manbavaran - current mood: mushroom, loves: mushroom

Hannah England - current mood: evil but the fun kind, loves: to fuck shit up

Barbara Parker - current mood: tired, loves: to rest for just five goddamn minutes

Jasminka Antonenko - current mood: vibing, loves: trashing your nft on twitter

Constanze “Conz” Amalie Von Braunschbank-Albrechtsberger - current mood: no, loves: using your modem to pirate triple a games

CREDITS:

Art, Coding, and Writing By Tan

Fire and Moonlight (Main Theme) By Trace (https://tracedinairlwa.tumblr.com)

Editing By Trace and Mana (https://lavmana.tumblr.com)

Special BIG BIG thank you to the LGW server for being supportive and general sweeties!! y'all know who you are and im grateful to you guys everyday!! thank you the server and the fandom that quite literally changed my life :]]

If you like my stuff, support my social media!!
